Title: It's Melon Time
Description:
<Farmer Yoon looks up at the sky and sniffs the air.>

Hmm...

<He licks his paw and holds it up in the air, sticks a toenail into the soil, and then inspects the length of his shadow.>

Yup. It's melon time.

Could you grab some seeds and help me plant a Striped Melon?
ObjectivesText: Plant a Striped Melon in Sunsong Ranch. You can purchase seeds from Merchant Greenfield in the Halfhill Market.
